settings.title: ABOUT
settings.heading: Nurse Created, Nurse Approved.
settings.content:
Providing nurses with products that provide a moment of escape.

Learn More

settings.title: INGREDIENTS
settings.heading: A moment of self care in a bottle!
settings.content:
This fragrance free hand cream was not only formulated to help heal dry, cracked, irritated skin, it was also created to be a moment of self care in a bottle. Being that nurses wash their hands many times per day, I formulated this lotion to include a barrier that locks in moisture and stays on through multiple hand-washes.

Learn More

settings.title: OUR MISSION
settings.heading: Empower nurses to fight burnout and stress
settings.content: Through self-care practices and products, we aim to give nurses a moment of escape allowing them to put themselves first.¬†

settings.title: NURSED CREATED
settings.heading: Nurse Created, nurse approved.
settings.content: As a self-proclaimed product junkie, I created Self Care RX to provide nurses (and nurse moms) with products that allow a moment of escape. I create products that target the specific needs of nurses to enhance their self-care journey. My goal is to encourage self-care, self-love and remind us that WE COME FIRST!

settings.title: Our Ingredients
settings.content:
Nurse Created and Nurse Approved.

LEARN MORE

settings.title: Get 10% Off
settings.content: Sign up for our newsletter and receive 10% off on your first order!

settings.title: MADE IN USA GUARANTEE!
settings.content: At Modernist Metal, we believe in employing hard working americans (just like you) that have a passion for creating quality masterpieces that your family will love and cherish for years.

settings.heading: HAND CRAFTED TO PERFECTION.
settings.content: There's a reason we are 'The Leader in Metal Art'. We focus on product quality before anything. Every piece is¬†handmade¬†by our American Based team and all materials are hand picked and meticulously quality controlled. Our products are precision laser engraved with thick 16-gauge steel. We‚Äôre perfectionists when it comes to the quality of your metal art piece(s).

settings.quote: Have a question? Contact us via the Contact page. Our support staff will get right to your question, same day!
Interested in Wholesale? Please reach out to our support staff and let us know. We'll have our direct sales department get in contact with you.
Shop with confidence, we offer 30 day satisfaction money-back guarantee service on all products at Modernist Metal.
